data.text:
So far from a 5 star; it's a 3 star at best.
Rooms not cleaned properly, when I complained the receptionist just shrugged and told me to speak to guest relations, which was unstaffed.
Very average food. Despite all-inclusive, 
mini bar not replenished and additional 2.5EUR for a fresh juice!
Loud music echoing around the hotel into the rooms at night.
Curtains are too small and don't block out the light!
It would be somewhat acceptable if it was not advertised as 5 star or charged so much.
data.title: 3 star at best. Very disappointing.

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest ,
We would like to thank you for choosing Porto Bello Hotel as a place of your holiday. It is a pleasure for us to welcome you at our hotel. It's a pitty that not all the moment of your holiday left a good impression. For such cases we have got Guestrelation Department which can help you to solve the problems all the time. Thank you for your review of our hotel. We will try to fix the problems you have mentioned. We will be very glad to welcome you in Porto Bello Hotel Resort & Spa again.
owner_response.author: Porto Bello

data.text:
Arrived 2 am on 27th March due to a cancelled flight. The manager (and his assistant who handed out wristbands ) attended around 200 exhausted irritable passengers .
He was the the most organised, calm. well mannered polite person who worked under such pressure .He was brilliant . In the morning he was still there at reception, not having slept ,still smiling !!

The hotel is fantastic
data.title: Brilliant manager

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,
Thank you for your precious time to share with us your review about your holiday. We are very happy that we could much your expectation.
On behalf of Sea Life Group Hotels, we will be happy to welcome you again in our hotel chain. Looking forward to seeing you at Porto Bello Hotel Resort & Spa.

Best regards,
Porto Bello Hotel Resort & Spa
owner_response.author: Porto Bello

data.text: It is a great hotel with awesome service and animation team. Every evening there is a program which is very fun and enjoyable. The food is good and there is a lot of selection. It is an experience for the whole family. All in all itâ€™s a super team and clean hotel.
data.title: Nice Hotel experience

data.text: This was my first time in Turkey and I couldn't choose better place. This was one of the best mini holidays that I had. Porto bello is an excellent and beautifull place. I had all inclusive and I couldn't ask for more. The room was much bigger than I was expecting, extremely clean and an amazing view to the mountains and beach. The lovely housekeepers were coming every single day to clean and change towels. I just forgot to mention that I am not good with highs ðŸ˜… so next time I will definitely request a ground floor apartment. The food was incredibly tasty, amazing, with lots of options. This was the best for me as I am a food lover. All the staff were very attentive all the time, friendly and they made me feel very welcome. My highlights goes to Patrick for such a brilliant host and entertairner as he is. Very good nigh parties, games and karaoke. The swimming pool and the gym are a must. My husband enjoyed every the gym every morning. Swimming pool really clean and warm water. I went to the spa and booked a couples room treatment. I have to confess that was one of the best massages ever. Unfortunately I have to say that the lady in the reception was really rude and not friendly at all. She definitely doesn't listen what customers are looking for and they needs. Sorry about is. I have over 15 years of experience in working in the best spas and hotels all over Europe, so sorry to leave this negative review. Was an incredible stay. You are the best. Thank you to the stuff who prepared the special table and offer a bottle of champagne for my wedding anniversary celebration. I'm planning already my next visit probably in the summer time.
data.title: The best place ever

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear valued guest,

Thank you so much for taking your precious time to write a comment regarding your recent stay at Porto Bello Hotel Resort & Spa.

We truly appreciate the fact that you enjoyed the facilities and services of our hotel. Our employees constantly strive to create the friendliest and most relaxing atmosphere for all of our guests.

We hope to see you soon again.
Best regards,
Porto Bello Hotel Resort & Spa
owner_response.author: Porto Bello

data.text: Hi so far weâ€™ve had a great time. Our room was a lot more spacious than we imagined with a great sea view. The buffet for lunch and dinner has been lovely, lots of choice. Breakfast could expand its variety but besides that all good. Highlight has been the spa facilities, staff and inevitably the entertainment. Patrick in particularly has been fantastic at keeping our trip fun and enjoyable. A phenomenal dancer. Me & my partner will definitely be back.
data.title: Beautiful weekend stay
